feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.118.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Additional validation for dynamic secret by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3299
  • Rework of secret imports on the overview page by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3303
  • Resolved ip getting populated in form by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3305
  • Keep Domains on writeInitalConfig for CLI login by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3298
  • feat: client secret compare optimization in machine identity login by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3309
  • Allow project approval workflows to set if a reviewer can or can not review their own requests by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3301

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.118.0-postgres...infisical/v0.118.1-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.36.22
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 68d07f013 Merge pull request #3323 from Infisical/feat/allowCustomHeadersOnCLI
  • 10a365832 Update go.mod to latest go-sdk version
  • e8ece6be3 Change SDK config customHeaders format
  • 6c0889f11 Allow custom headers on Config, improve docs and GetRestyClientWithCustomHeaders logic
  • 5b1123232 Allow custom headers on CLI
  • d4125443a Add file support to secrets set key=value command

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.119.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(k8s): preserve helm charts and streamline release process by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3302
  • Show usage and billing for self-hosted instances by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3290
  • feat(helm/infisical-core): nodeSelector and tolerations support by @artyom-p in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/2561
  • misc: privilege management v2 transition by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3193
  • Added provider oidc claim in audit log event by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3319
  • Add file support to secrets set key=value command by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3316
  • docs: add new secret actions to permission doc by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3325
  • Feat/allow custom headers on cli by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3323
  • Set modal=false on DropdownMenu on MinimizedOrgSidebar orgDetails option by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3329
  • Fix infinite loading icon on snapshot button by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3330
  • Improve FilterableSelect to support optional grouping by option field by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3331
  • feat: minor bug fixes and patch by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3336
  • Mark TeamCity secrets as password type and Hidden visibility on syncs by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3335
  • feat(k8s): go templating support for InfisicalPushSecret CRD by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3326

New Contributors

  • @artyom-p made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/2561

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.118.1-postgres...infisical/v0.119.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.36.23
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 85e9952a4 Fix issue with missing token on secrets set command CLI

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.120.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: remove users with capitalized usernames from projects by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3341
  • feat(audit-logs): filter audit logs by secret key by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3311
  • Folder last secret commit feature by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3315
  • Add Telemetry for Infisical PKI by @dangtony98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3342
  • Add replicate folder content functionality by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3289
  • Fix/access tree improvements by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3324
  • Fix issue with missing token on secrets set command CLI by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3349
  • misc: improved docs for secret ref and notices by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3353
  • Add new PasswordGenerator and Slider components by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3352
  • Project access request by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3354
  • feat: updated project access note to max a limit by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3361
  • Fetch self hosted license feature set without needing to redeploy the instance by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3355
  • feat: Fix pgadmin in dev by @asp143 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3363
  • Update UI for all projects/my projects by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3366
  • Feature: Secret Rotations v2 by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3343
  • feat: added env for dynamic secret to allow internal ip by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3369
  • added check for org in project id by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3370
  • misc: add missing version filter in get secret by name by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3371

New Contributors

  • @asp143 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3363

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.119.0-postgres...infisical/v0.120.0-postgres
